title: Gillan - Gillan [The Japanese Album] [320k MP3]
description:
Gillan is the first album by British rock band Gillan, released in September 1978. It was only released in Japan, Australia and New Zealand, but the album sold well in the UK as an import, aided by positive press reviews. The sleeve notes of the original release credit Liam Genocky as playing drums and percussion, while the 1993 release "Gillan Ã¢â‚¬â€œ The Japanese Album" instead credits Pete Barnacle.
